name: Exp_SCADA_Red_Pnt_Add_EPRSC05K
action: <* DoNotResetAtt *><*SELECTVALUE(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-RSC05K)*>[IF]([GT](<*eval(INT(Fix((<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>-(INT(Fix(<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>/10000)))*10000)/5000)))*>,0)){<*SETATVQTY(Exp_Ent_Grp_Part_Summary:EP-RSC05K, <*eval(INT(Fix((<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>-(INT(Fix(<*VALUE(Experion SCADA Points (0 - 300000))*>/10000)))*10000)/5000)))*>)*>}{0}[ENDIF]<* DoResetAtt *>
